text: Bursera tonkinensis is a species of plant in the Burseraceae family.Guillaumin, André 1907. Revue Generale de Botanique 19:161 It is endemic to Vietnam and listed as "vulnerable."World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Bursera tonkinensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Vietnam tonkinensis Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Plants described in 1907 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Bursera tonkinensis
